duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a book of residual income through effective business-to-business sales strategies.
Prioritize opportunities, manage multiple touch points, and follow through to drive successful outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to simplify client acquisition and lead generation.
Maintain client relationships, drive future revenue growth, and ensure high customer renewal rates.
Participate in critical business discussions to identify and address business owners' needs and challenges.
